newsitem.title: USA: Giant Food names Pete Manos chairman.
newsitem.headline: Giant Food names Pete Manos chairman.

text.p: Giant Food Inc said Monday its board of directors had named Pete Manos, its president and chief executive officer, to the added post of chairman of the board.
Manos, who has been serving as president since 1992 and chief executive officer since 1995, now also fills the post left vacant by Israel Cohen after he died in November 1995, it said.
The company said the board had also promoted Alvin Dobbin to executive vice president and chief operating officer from senior vice president of operations, a post he had held since 1977.
